title: LTB Chance Red Portrait , Tinker Portrait and others
author: ricktmd

posts.post_title: LTB Chance Red Portrait , Tinker Portrait and others
posts.post_content: I am looking to buy a Chance Red Portrait and Tinker Portrait  .  I prefer either PSA 4 or 5. I Will consider other graded or nice cards. I am looking for Old Mill ,EPDG or Sovereign backs.  Other T206's portraits I am looking for include Huggins Keeler and Lajoie , Chesbro, Mathewson , McGraw no cap , and Young with backs other than Piedmont. I am open to overprint SC backs on certain cards.

PM Sent


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
